organizations: California State Association of Counties Legislative Conference

thread.title: Fired regulator: Brown pushed to waive oil safeguards.
thread.title_full: Fired regulator: Brown pushed to waive oil safeguards.

title: Fired regulator: Brown pushed to waive oil safeguards.
text: Fired regulator: Brown pushed to waive oil safeguards. By Associated Press | September 3, 2015 @ 10:56 pm FILE - In this Wednesday May 27, 2015 file photo, California Gov. Jerry Brown addresses the California State Association of Counties Legislative Conference in Sacramento, Calif. California's top oil and gas regulators repeatedly warned Gov. Jerry Brown's senior aides in 2011 that the governor's orders to override key safeguards in granting oil industry permits would violate state and federal laws protecting the state's groundwater from contamination, one of the former officials has testified. (AP Photo/Rich Pedroncelli, File)
